Package fun.connor.cafe.security

Provides the cafe.connor.fun API used for security related behavior.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SecurityRepository
    DAO for auth resources.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MongoSecurityRepository
    A Mongo-DB implementation of SecurityRepository.

Package fun.connor.cafe.security Description

Provides the cafe.connor.fun API used for security related behavior. This most notably includes the SecurityRepository and it's implementations.
